item.title: Plants vs. Zombies
item.dc:creator: rokhopper
item.description: Get ready to soil your plants as a mob of fun-loving zombies is about to invade your home. Use your arsenal of 49 zombie-zapping plants — peashooters, wall-nuts, cherry bombs and more — to mulchify 26 types of zombies before they break down your door.
item.content:encoded: Get ready to soil your plants as a mob of fun-loving zombies is about to invade your home. Use your arsenal of 49 zombie-zapping plants — peashooters, wall-nuts, cherry bombs and more — to mulchify 26 types of zombies before they break down your door.

item.title: Dragon Age: Origins
item.dc:creator: rokhopper
item.description: Dragon Age: Origins — компьютерная ролевая игра, разработанная канадской студией BioWare и выпущенная компанией Electronic Arts для Windows, Playstation 3, Xbox 360 и macOS в 2009 году. Это первая игра в серии Dragon Age.
item.content:encoded: Dragon Age: Origins — компьютерная ролевая игра, разработанная канадской студией BioWare и выпущенная компанией Electronic Arts для Windows, Playstation 3, Xbox 360 и macOS в 2009 году. Это первая игра в серии Dragon Age.

item.title: Command & Conquer: Red Alert 3
item.dc:creator: rokhopper
item.description: Command & Conquer: Red Alert 3 is a real-time strategy game from the Command & Conquer series developed by EA Los Angeles. This is the first game in the Red Alert series since Yuri’s Revenge, released in 2001.
item.content:encoded: Command & Conquer: Red Alert 3 is a real-time strategy game from the Command & Conquer series developed by EA Los Angeles. This is the first game in the Red Alert series since Yuri’s Revenge, released in 2001.
